title: Login page not loading
description: The login page is stuck on a white screen after entering my credentials. I've tried clearing my cache and using a different browser, but the issue persists.

title: Password reset link expired
description: I requested a password reset but the link I received says it's expired, even though it was sent just a few minutes ago. I need to access my account urgently.

title: Account verification email not received
description: I signed up for a new account yesterday but haven't received the verification email. I've checked my spam folder and it's not there.

title: Unable to upload profile picture
description: When I try to upload a new profile picture, the site gives me an 'unknown error' message. The image is a standard JPG file under 2MB.

title: Billing discrepancy on last invoice
description: My last invoice shows a charge for a service I canceled last month. Please investigate and correct the charge.

title: Subscription cancellation not processed
description: I canceled my subscription two weeks ago, but I just received an email about my upcoming renewal. Can you confirm the cancellation has been processed?

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after I open it. I'm using an iPhone 14 running the latest iOS.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: I'd love to see a dark mode option for the web application. It would be much easier on my eyes during late-night use.

title: Exporting data to CSV fails
description: The 'Export to CSV' button is not working. Clicking it does nothing, and there are no error messages.

title: Incorrect order history displayed
description: My order history shows items I didn't purchase. Can you please correct this and ensure my account information is secure?

title: UI bug: Button overlaps text
description: On the 'My Profile' page, the 'Edit' button overlaps with the customer's name, making it hard to click.

title: Cannot update shipping address
description: I'm trying to update my shipping address for a new order but the form fields are locked. I can't type in the new information.

title: Question about API documentation
description: I'm having trouble understanding the API endpoint for fetching user data. The documentation seems a bit unclear. Can I get some clarification?

title: Subscription renewal fee is too high
description: I was charged a renewal fee that's higher than what's listed on the pricing page. Is there a promotion I missed or is this an error?

title: Performance issue: Slow page loading
description: The dashboard page has been loading very slowly for the past few days. It takes over 10 seconds to fully load.
